abstract: Financing decisions that entrepreneurs make early on can affect how much money they will reap later. The Deal Professor compares the initial public offerings of Groupon, Zynga and Angie’s List.
snippet: Financing decisions that entrepreneurs make early on can affect how much money they will reap later. The Deal Professor compares the initial public offerings of Groupon, Zynga and Angie’s List.
lead_paragraph: So you want to be an Internet billionaire. It’s not just about having a great idea and building a world-class business at light speed.

headline.main: The Wisest Entrepreneurs Know How to Preserve Equity
